===Etymology===
From {{compound|幾|何|tr1=ki|tr2=ka|t1=how much|t2=what|lang=ja}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{homophones|lang=ja|気化|帰化}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|きか}}

# {{alternative form of|lang=ja|幾何学||geometry}}

====Derived terms====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|リーマン幾何|リーマンきか}}: [[Riemann geometry]], [[Riemannian geometry]]
* {{ja-r|代数幾何|だいすうきか}}: [[algebraic geometry]]
* {{ja-r|位相幾何|いそうきか}}: [[topology]]
* {{ja-r|幾何学|きかがく}}: [[geometry]]
{{der-mid}}
* {{ja-r|幾何学的|きかがくてき}}: geometrical
* {{ja-r|幾何級数|きかきゅうすう}}: [[geometric series]], [[geometric progression]]
* {{ja-r|微分幾何|びぶんきか}}: [[differential geometry]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Adverb===
{{ja-pos|いくばく|adverb}}

# [[how many]], [[how much]]

====Alternative forms====

====Usage notes====
* In modern Japanese, the spellings [[いくばく]], [[幾許]] and [[幾ばく]] are preferred over [[幾何]] when used as an adverb.
